主成分略述: IRON (FERROUS FUMARATE), SOYBEAN OIL ( EQ TO SOYA BEAN OIL), MAGNESIUM (SULFATE), NIACINAMIDE (NICOTINAMIDE), THIAMINE (VITAMIN B1), RIBOFLAVIN (VIT B2), PYRIDOXINE(VITAMIN B6), CYANOCOBALAMIN (VIT B12), VITAMIN B12 (CYANOCOBALAMIN 1%), FOLIC ACID, PANTOTHENATE CALCIUM, ASCORBIC ACID (VIT C), TOCOPHEROL ACETATE ALPHA DL-, LECITHIN(LECITHOL), WAX MIXTURE HYDROGENATED COCONUT OIL, ZINC (ZINC SULFATE), BEESWAX (YELLOW BEESWAXCERA FLAVAWAX FLAVA)

主製造廠.製造廠名稱: F020018000  R.P. SCHERER HOLDINGS PTY. LTD.
